mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT E.REC_NO,E.ENT_NO, REC_TITLE, REC_CONTENTS,REC_OTHER, REC_STARTDATE, REC_ENDDATE, REC_INFO,REC_PREFER, REC_WELFARE, REC_QUALIFICATION, REC_PEPOLE, REC_CAREER, REC_ORDER, REC_TYPE, REC_CATEGORY,ENT_NAME,T.MEM_NO,OPEN_CHECK, REP_NAME, REP_PHONE,ENT_LOGO, REPLACE(REC_SALARY,' ') AS REC_SALARY FROM RECRUITMENT E LEFT JOIN REVIEW S ON (S.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN INTERESTEDRECRUITMENT T ON(T.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE R ON (R.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN SUPPORT U ON (U.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = U.MEM_NO) ORDER BY REC_STARTDATE ASC

SELECT DISTINCT E.REC_NO,E.ENT_NO, REC_TITLE, E.REC_OTHER, REC_CONTENTS, REC_STARTDATE, REC_ENDDATE, REC_INFO,REC_PREFER, REC_WELFARE, REC_QUALIFICATION, REC_PEPOLE, REC_CAREER, REC_ORDER, REC_TYPE, REC_CATEGORY,ENT_NAME,OPEN_CHECK, REP_NAME, REP_PHONE,ENT_LOGO, REPLACE(REC_SALARY,' ') AS REC_SALARY FROM RECRUITMENT E LEFT JOIN REVIEW S ON (S.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN INTERESTEDRECRUITMENT T ON(T.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN ENTERPRISE R ON (R.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO) LEFT JOIN SUPPORT U ON (U.REC_NO = E.REC_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = U.MEM_NO) WHERE REC_CATEGORY=#{anoNum} ORDER BY E.REC_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUITMENT WHERE REC_CATEGORY = #{anoNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECRUITMENT WHERE REC_CATEGORY = #{recNo}
